abilities.description: A Gear 2 enhanced double palm strike where Luffy stretches both arms back and launches a high-speed attack with devastating power.
A Gear 2 enhanced rapid-fire punch barrage capable of attacking in multiple directions simultaneously, overwhelming multiple opponents or countering multiple techniques at once.

keyMoments.title: Gear 2 Overwhelms Haki Users
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gear 2 to demonstrate that superior speed can overcome Observation Haki, as Sandersonia cannot react fast enough despite seeing his attacks.

keyMoments.title: Jet Bazooka Debut
keyMoments.description: First use of Gomu Gomu no Jet Bazooka, sending Boa Marigold flying with enhanced power.

keyMoments.title: Jet Gatling Debut
keyMoments.description: First use of Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling, nullifying both sisters' ultimate techniques simultaneously.

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：キングコブラ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Kingu Kobura

abilities.description: A transformation technique where Sandersonia manifests her hair as eight independent snake heads, referencing the eight-headed serpent of Japanese mythology. Each head can attack independently with King Cobra abilities.

keyMoments.title: Full Yamata no Orochi Transformation
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia demonstrates her ultimate technique, transforming her hair into eight snake heads that attack Luffy simultaneously.

keyMoments.title: Yamata no Orochi Countered by Jet Gatling
keyMoments.description: Despite the power of the Yamata no Orochi technique, it is completely nullified by Luffy's Jet Gatling, showing the gap when Luffy uses Gear 2.

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：アナコンダ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Anakonda

abilities.description: A technique where Marigold coats herself in flames, combining her Anaconda transformation with fire to enhance her physical attacks. The flames provide both offensive power and create dangerous situations for opponents.

keyMoments.title: Salamander Fire Technique Revealed
keyMoments.description: Marigold demonstrates her signature fire-coating technique, combining her Zoan powers with flames for devastating attacks.

keyMoments.title: Salamander Fire Burns Sandersonia's Clothes
keyMoments.description: The Salamander technique's flames accidentally set Sandersonia's clothes on fire, creating the crisis that threatens to expose their slave marks but allows Luffy to demonstrate his character.
